This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment. For every sq. Metre of fabric, 9 pet bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind. This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

Perfect Fit Hive Plain White Duo Thermal Blind (Kingston blindsdirect)

Hive blinds have a unique honeycomb structure, which not only offer light control but are also energy saving. They can regulate room temperature by helping to reduce heat loss in winter and help keep rooms cool in summer. The effect is to maximise natural light while preventing glare to create a cool and relaxing environment. Cellular Warm White Thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind (Swift directblinds)

Cellular pleated blinds are given their namesake because their 'celluar shade' is made of layers bonded together to creae honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit heat transfer from the window. These pockets create the attractive pleating effect on the front and slow down the heat loss in your room. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds, celluar pleated blinds are effective at keeping your house warm during the winter and cool during the summer.

White creates a clean and crisp look, favoured for being the easiest colour to work with when designing a room.

This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment. For every sq. Metre of fabric, 9 pet bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind. Eco Friendly Fr White Recycled Electric Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

Their eco-friendly, recycled electric roller blinds are made from 100% pet recycled waste. This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment. For every sq. Metre of fabric, 9 pet bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind. Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new white roller blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.

In the palest white with a leafy double-sided design its perfect to create a light and airy space. Ideal for a soft, feminine bedroom, a bathroom or to add a delicate focal point in a kitchen, this dreamy blind is made using a blackout fabric to keep daylight out when you need to and a safe, flame retardant finish.

Isla Pvc Blackout Aloe Green Electric Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

Isla pvc blackout aloe green double-sided electric roller blind features a soft wash of calming blue, instantly transporting you to the long, hot days of summer. With a textured leafy design, its ideal for adding a gentle splash colour to a serene room. The blackout fabric will keep light away when you want to shut the world out and its flame retardant too for extra safety. Isla pvc blackout aloe green is made of moisture resistant fabric, so it's extremely easy to keep it clean.

Vesper Snow Electric Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

Their beautiful vesper blind range is available in 2 neutral elegant tones. This white semi-translucent roller blind wil be amodern and stylish addition to any room in your home. Product id: db-erbx1596 fabric colour: snow material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes vesper snow electric roller blind in white.

Luxari Pvc Blackout White Electric Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

Their luxari pvc blackout range is available in classic colours and is ideal for damp rooms or areas that are exposed to heat. This fresh white roller blind is made from a pvc fabric so is therefore waterproof and flame retardant - perfect for kitchens and bathrooms. Product id: db-erbx1839 fabric colour: white material: fiberglass core laminated with pvc layered coating lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes luxari pvc blackout white electric roller blind in white.

Willow Blackout Birch White Electric Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

Soft, muted grey with wispy willow branches make a delicate willow blackout birch white electric blackout roller blind choice for a bedroom or living area. It blends well with most neutral dcor and gives a feminine yet contemporary feel to your chosen space. Finished with pollergen, it is a good option for hayfever sufferers as it neutralises pollen so reducing symptoms. The electric operation is easy to use and the blind opens and closes at the touch of a button.
